name: opendata.swiss
tagline: The productive portal for Swiss Open Government Data will launch on 18 January, 2016
body:
The Swiss open government data pilot portal «opendata.admin.ch» is replaced by the production portal «opendata.swiss». The portal [opendata.swiss](http://opendata.swiss) will launch on 18 January, 2016.

The portal [opendata.swiss](http://opendata.swiss) is a joint project of the confederation, cantons, municipalities and further organizations with a public mandate. It will provide open government data for the public in a central catalog. The Swiss Federal Archives operates opendata.swiss.

For questions please contact the opendata.swiss portal team of the Swiss Federal Archives: opendata@bar.admin.ch

***
© [Swiss Federal Archives SFA](http://www.bar.admin.ch/themen/01648/index.html?lang=en), Berne 2015
